p: Urinary tests were completed using Drug-screen Multi 7A card (Nal von Minden, Moers, Germany) and read by the BLOTrix C1 reader piloted by B4C software (BioSciTec, Frankfurt, Germany). The detection threshold was set at 300 ng/mL for heroin and 500 ng/mL for methamphetamine. A fingerprint machine allowed unique identification of participants and avoided repeated enrollments.
